extension.summary: Collections of Chinese series dubbed in Khmer from various sites
extension.description: Use at your own risk. This add-on is not affiliated with any content providers.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with any of the content providers. Use at your own discretion.

extension.summary: The one and only Khmer Dubbed addons by Dodgex and Goupon.
Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi, απλοποίηση της ανάπτυξης των προσθέτων που χρησιμοποιούν πολλαπλούς εξυπηρετητές για υλικό βίντεο
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
extension.disclaimer: This script only resolves video content from legitimate file lockers without prejudice. If this script is being used by 3rd parties to resolve content that you feel infringes upon your Intellectual Property then please take your complaints to the actual website or developer linking to such content and not here. This script in no way searches for any content whatsoever.

Το ανωτέρο σενάριο το μόνο που κάνει είναι να επιλύει οπτικοακουστικό περιεχόμενο από νόμιμες πηγές χωρίς προκατάληψη. Εάν το ανωτέρο σενάριο χρησιμοποιηθεί από τρίτους ώστε να επιλύσει περιεχόμενο το οποίο σας προκαλεί αντίδραση ότι παραβιάζει την πνευματική σας ιδιοκτησία παρακαλώ μεταφέρετε τα παραπονά σας στον ιστότοπο τον οποίο βρίσκεται το εν λόγω περιεχόμενο η τον δημιουργό ο οποίος πραγματοποιεί την σύνδεση και όχι εδω. Το σενάριο αυτό ουδεμία περίπτωση πραγματοποιεί αναζήτηση περιεχομένου.

extension.news: 0.1.1 - If --url is used, it will always be used as an URL. 0.1.0 - New commands --file and --format got added, they can create valid URLs from a file for the new base64 URL style. - The LiveProxy URL build was simplified, a Streamlink command like can be used after it got base64 encoded, more details can be found on the website. 0.0.4 - Improve Streamlink default Plugins load speed - Custom plugins with `from streamlink.plugin.api import http` are not allowed, use `self.session` 0.0.3 - Allow FFmpeg and RTMP streams, might not work on every platform. 0.0.1 - LiveProxy Test Version

0.53.0 - on_open() missing 1 required positional argument: 'ws' (#471) 0.52.0 - fixed callback argument in _app.py (#468) - Fixing none compare bug in run_forever (#472) - Fix NoneType bug introduced by #386 fix (#476) 0.51.0 - revert "WebSocketApp class to make it inheritable (#442)" because of breaking the compatibily 0.50.0 - fixed pong before ping (#461) - pass proper arguments to method callbacks (#462) 0.49.0 - WebSocketApp class to make it inheritable (#442) - Add option to disable sending the Origin header (#459) - Websocket.close() meaning of "close status: XXXXX" (#414) - Enable multithreading protection with ping_interval (#448) - reset WebsocketApp.sock (#450) - websocket.enableTrace not working (#455) - AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'NullHandler' (#443) - WebSocketBadStatusException "not enough arguments for format string" (#454) - handshake should deal with None in headers (#432) 0.48.0 - Add NullHandler to logger to fix python 2 issue. (#400) - Fix the issue that websocket status message may not present (#403) - Socket error not raised in nested try except in python2 (#408) - Load system default certificates if none are given (#415) - Fix waiting forever on ping/pong timeout (#411) - socks5 via pysocks support (#417) - v0.47.0 breaks ability to stop stream with `run_forever` (#410) - _http.py: fix windows proxy error due to socktype (#427)

extension.description: custom streamlink plugins that can be used for service.liveproxy

extension.news: 1.0.0 - Streamlink 1.0.0 0.14.2.138 - Streamlink 0.14.2+138.gb21df07 0.14.2.86 - Streamlink 0.14.2+86.g2c9cfe84 0.14.2.42 - Streamlink 0.14.2+42.gb3c7648 0.14.2.33 - Streamlink 0.14.2+33.g33f677b 0.14.2.18 - Streamlink 0.14.2.17 and updated Zattoo version 0.14.0 - Streamlink 0.14.0 0.13.0.48 - Streamlink 0.13.0+48.g512b5f0 0.13.0.18 - Streamlink 0.13.0+18.g3136f96 0.13.0 - sync https://pypi.org/project/streamlink/0.13.0/ - Removed custom commands, they are not handled in a custom plugin 0.12.1.2 - Streamlink version aee97e555971a8995e59f37efb092b694214b5d7 with experimental custom commands --hls-session-reload-time --hls-session-reload-segment 0.12.1.1 - Streamlink version 1307bc19e5c54d7bd8f6bba0d1c84a736a72c7ba

extension.description: ISO 8601 date/time parser repacked for Kodi

extension.news: 0.9 - New entry for Kosovo (XK / XKX) - Swaziland changed to Eswatini (effective 2018-07-16) - "United States" -> "United States of America"
